vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἰσσαχάρ (Rec. Ἰσαχ-, Ἰσασχ- (Elz.), T, -άχαρ), ὁ indecl. (FlJ, Ἰσάχαρις, Ἰσάσχ-) (Heb. יִשָּׂשכָר, Gen.30:18),
Issachar: Rev.7:7.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.shortDef: Issachar, "there is a reward [<ref='Gen.30.18'>Ge. 30:18</ref>]; may [God] show mercy; hired hand"
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Issachar living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.30.18;
son of: Israel (H3478) and Leah (H3812);
brother of: Reuben (H7205), Simeon (H8095), Levi (H3878), Judah (H3063), Zebulun (H2074) and Dinah (H1783);
half-brother of: Dan (H1835H), Naphtali (H5321), Gad (H1410), Asher (H0836), Joseph (H3130) and Benjamin (H1144);
father of: Tola (H8439), Puah (H6312), Jashub (H3437H) and Shimron (H8110B)
§ Issachar, "there is a reward [Ge. 30:18]; may [God] show mercy; hired hand"
Issachar (Proper name)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以薩迦 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "獎賞、價值"
雅各的第九個兒子，利亞的第五個兒子 (啟 7:7)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
以萨迦 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "奖赏、价值"
雅各的第九个儿子，利亚的第五个儿子 (启 7:7)
